sentences.sContent: I’ve just got a few minor quibbles.

synos.tran: 诡辩；挑剔；说模棱两可的话

hwds.w: prove that black is white and white black

remMethod.val: 来自quib (嘲讽) + ble → 吹毛求疵的反对意见

words.tran: 推托；说模棱两可的话（quibble的ing形式）

trans.tranCn: 谬论； 双关话； 俏皮话； 吹毛求疵的意见
trans.tranOther: a small complaint or criticism about something unimportant
